DataElement.preferredName: Cancer Patient Tobacco Use Questionnaire 19 Current Living with Smoker Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of whether or not they are currently living with a smoker.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Cancer Patient Tobacco Use Questionnaire Currently Living with Smoker
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire developed for the baseline and longitudinal assessment of tobacco use in the cancer setting. Domains include cigarette smoking history and current use, use relative to cancer diagnosis and treatment, other tobacco product use, cessation, and second-hand exposure._A question about whether an individual is currently living with a smoker.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire developed for the baseline and longitudinal assessment of tobacco use in the cancer setting. Domains include cigarette smoking history and current use, use relative to cancer diagnosis and treatment, other tobacco product use, cessation, and second-hand exposure.

Concepts.definition: A questionnaire developed for the baseline and longitudinal assessment of tobacco use in the cancer setting. Domains include cigarette smoking history and current use, use relative to cancer diagnosis and treatment, other tobacco product use, cessation, and second-hand exposure.

Property.preferredDefinition: A question about whether an individual is currently living with a smoker.

Concepts.definition: A question about whether an individual is currently living with a smoker.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Are you currently living with
ReferenceDocuments.description: Are you currently living with a smoker?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Using PRO/HRQoL Measures
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is part of a full set of items that comprise a PRO/HRQoL measure. The full set must be used without any changes to the questions or value sets in order to retain the validity and reliability associated with the measure. Changes may not be made to these CDEs.
